lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Malaysia's external debts total 48 to 49 billion ringgit and its debt service ratio exceeds 20 pct, the Development Bank of Singapore Ltd, one of Singapore's four major local banks, said in a report released this week.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With declining incomes and export earnings, the bases for resource generation became limited, and the government will not raise taxes because current tax margins are high compared to Malaysia's neighbours, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Malaysian Finance Minister Daim Zainuddin presented a budget for 1987 which foresees a deficit of 9.4 billion ringgit, down from 11.6 billion in 1986, with federal spending targetted at 27.4 billion, down from 30.8 billion, and revenue at 18 billion against 19.2 billion.
